sentence.Network_en: Sequella of STIs include infertility chronic pelvic pain ectopic pregnancy and other adverse pregnancy outcomes.
sentence.Network_cn: 该疾病导致的后果有不孕不育,慢性盆腔炎,异位妊娠及其他的不良妊娠后果.

auth_sentence.content: While we may not always find the sequella of our activities to our liking our activities are well within the natural sphere.
